item.title: Border standoff flares over BSF Joypurhat re-fencing bid
item.description: Tension has returned to the Joypurhat border after Bangladesh border troopers stopped an attempt by India’s Border Security Force (BSF) to re-fence a sensitive stretch of the frontier, raising fresh concerns among residents of the area. The incident unfolded on Saturday at Ghonapara along th

item.title: NCP, LDP join Jamaat-led alliance
item.description: Two more political parties have joined an alliance of eight like-minded parties led by Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami, Jamaat Amir Dr Shafiqur Rahman said on Sunday. He said the newly added parties are the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) and the National Citizen Party (NCP). Dr Shafiqur made the annou

item.title: Online Editors Alliance president Hasan Sharif, secretary Mizan Sohel
item.description: A new executive committee of the Online Editors Alliance (OEA), an organisation of heads of online and digital departments of leading media outlets in the country, was formed for the 2026 term during its annual general meeting (AGM) on Saturday. The AGM was held at Waterfall Restaurant and Convent

item.title: Jara, Tajnuva invited to Aam Jonotar Dal
item.description: Aam Jonotar Dal’s General Secretary Tarek Rahman has invited former National Citizen Party (NCP) leaders Tasnim Jara and Tajnuva Jabeen to join his party. He made the call in a Facebook post at 2:10pm on Sunday. “For those who are leaving NCP because of Jamaat, the doors of the Aam Jo

item.title: Ukraine's DTEK says power restored to 1 million Kyiv-area households
item.description: Ukraine's leading private energy provider said on Sunday that it had restored power to more than a million households in and around Kyiv a day after a Russian air attack had forced emergency outages. A combined missile and drone attack early on Saturday had killed two people and knocked out power

item.title: Bangladesh expresses concern over minority killings in India
item.description: Bangladesh has expressed deep concern over recent incidents of minority killings and violence in India. Dhaka has called for fair investigations into these incidents and for bringing the guilty to justice. SM Mahbubul Alam, spokesperson of the Foreign Ministry, expressed this concern on Sunday (De

item.title: Amazon halts plans for drone delivery in Italy
item.description: Amazon (AMZN.O) said on Sunday it has decided not to pursue plans to deliver goods by drone in Italy, saying that while it had made good progress with aerospace regulators, broader business regulatory issues did not support the project. The Italian civil aviation ENAC called the decision unexpecte

item.title: Central African Republic votes, Russia ally Touadera seeks third term
item.description: Central African Republic President Faustin-Archange Touadera is seeking a third term on Sunday as the chronically unstable country holds national elections, touting security gains made with the help of Russian mercenaries and Rwandan soldiers. The 68-year-old mathematician oversaw a constitutional

item.title: Tepid early turnout in Myanmar election as junta touts stability
item.description: Under the shadow of civil war and questions over the poll's credibility, voters in Myanmar cast their ballots in apparently low numbers in a general election on Sunday, the first since a military coup toppled the last civilian government in 2021. The junta, having crushed pro-democracy protests af

item.title: Inqilab Moncho‘s blockade triggers massive traffic jam on Dhaka-M’singh highway
item.description: A massive traffic jam was created on the Dhaka-Mymensingh highway on Sunday following a blockade enforced by Inqilab Moncho, demanding the swift arrest and trial of those responsible for the killing of martyr Sharif Osman bin Hadi. A group of protesters blocked the highway in front of Uttara&rsquo

item.title: CA orders tighter cybersecurity for polls
item.description: Chief Advisor Muhammad Yunus has instructed the National Cyber Security Agency to intensify efforts to counter all forms of cybercrime ahead of the February elections. Yunus gave the order on Sunday at a meeting of the National Cyber Security Council, according to the Chief Advisor’s Office

item.title: AI reshapes storytelling from script to screen in China
